item.name: Pure Incense

item.name: Pikanium Z Held

item.name: Bottle Cap
item.description: Trade to Mr. Hyper to maximize one of a Pokémon's genes.

item.name: Gold Bottle Cap
item.description: Trade to Mr. Hyper to maximize all of a Pokémon's genes.

item.name: Z Ring
item.description: Allows the player's Pokémon to use Z-moves.

item.description: Held: Allows Decidueye to upgrade Spirit Shackle into Sinister Arrow Raid.

item.name: Incinium Z Held

item.name: Aloraichium Z Held

item.name: Eevium Z Held

item.name: Mewnium Z Held

item.name: Forage Bag
item.description: Holds ingredients during Mallow's trial.

item.name: Fishing Rod
item.description: Allows the player to fish for Pokémon.

item.name: Professors Mask
item.description: Lost by Professor Kukui.

item.name: Festival Ticket
item.description: Hosts a mission in Festival Plaza.

item.name: Sparkling Stone
item.description: Required to obtain a Z-Ring.

item.name: Adrenaline Orb
item.description: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies. Held: increases the holder's Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.

item.name: Zygarde Cube
item.description: Contains collected Zygarde cells/cores. Can teach Zygarde moves.

item.name: Ice Stone
item.description: Evolves an Alola Sandshrew into Alola Sandslash or an Alola Vulpix into Alola Ninetales.

item.name: Ride Pager
item.description: Allows the player to summon a Ride Pokémon.

item.name: Beast Ball
item.description: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 5× for Ultra Beasts and 0.1× for all other Pokémon.

item.name: Big Malasada
item.description: Cures major status ailments and confusion.

item.description: Changes Oricorio to Baile Style.

item.description: Changes Oricorio to Pom-Pom Style.

item.description: Changes Oricorio to Pa’u Style.

item.name: Sun Flute
item.description: Evolves Nebby into Solgaleo when used at the Altar of the Sunne.

item.name: Moon Flute
item.description: Evolves Nebby into Lunala when used at the Altar of the Moone.

item.name: Enigmatic Card
item.description: Unlocks Looker's motel room on Route 8.

item.name: Terrain Extender
item.description: Held: Extends the holder's Terrain effects to 8 turns.

item.name: Protective Pads
item.description: Held: Prevents side effects of contact moves used on the holder.

item.name: Grassy Seed
item.description: Held: Consumed on Grassy Terrain and raises the holder's Defense by one stage.

item.name: Throat Spray
item.description: Raises Special Attack when a Pokémon uses a sound-based move.

item.name: Blunder Policy
item.description: Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a move because of accuracy.

item.name: Eject Pack
item.description: When the holder's stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

item.name: Room Service
item.description: Lowers Speed in Trick Room.

item.name: Rusted Shield
item.description: When held, transforms Zamazenta into its Crowned Shield Forme. Changes its stats and gains an added Steel-type.

item.name: Rusted Sword
item.description: When held, transforms Zacian into its Crowned Sword Forme. Changes its stats and gains an added Steel-type.

item.name: Tart Apple
item.description: Used to evolve Applin into Appletun.

item.name: Clover Sweet
item.description: Used to evolve Milcery into Alcremie.

item.name: Star Sweet
item.description: Used to evolve Milcery into Alcremie.

item.description: Throw one into a Pokémon Den to attract a wild Dynamax Pokémon.

item.description: Raises a Pokemon's Speed growth rate and lowers its Special Attack growth rate

item.name: Max Honey
item.description: Honey that Dynamax Vespiquen produces. Adding this honey to Max Soup makes the taste very smooth. It also has the same effect as a Max Revive.

item.name: Max Mushrooms
item.description: Mushrooms that have the power of changing Dynamax forms. They boost all stats of a Pokémon during battle.

item.name: Galarica Twig
item.description: A twig from a species of tree called Galarica that grows in certain areas around the Galar region. It’s a material for an accessory for a certain Pokémon.

item.name: Galarica Cuff
item.description: A cuff made from woven-together Galarica Twigs. Giving it to Galarian Slowpoke makes the Pokémon very happy.

item.name: Style Card
item.description: A card that increases the selection in boutiques and hair salons.

item.name: Armor Pass
item.description: A pass to go to the Isle of Armor. Show it to the rail staff at Wedgehurst Station.

item.name: Rotom Bike
item.description: This bike can do a turbo boost and run on the water using Rotom’s power. It’s a sparkling white that shines brilliantly.

item.name: Exp. Charm
item.description: A charm that increases the Exp. Points that Pokémon can get. A machine-like object is inside the charm.

item.name: Armorite Ore
item.description: Rare ore that can be obtained on the Isle of Armor. Something good will happen if you give it to a collector on the Isle of Armor.

item.name: Mark Charm
item.description: A mysterious and unique charm that increases the chance of finding a Pokémon with a mark.
